# bds-alert



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                  | Type      | Default |
| -------- | --------- | ---------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `open`   | `open`    | Used to open/close the alert | `boolean` | `false` |


## Methods

### `toggle() => Promise<void>`

Can be used outside to open/close the alert

#### Returns

Type: `Promise<void>`
